thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Linda Mayes

author: Linda Mayes
title: Linda Mayes
text: Everything was great and the price was great except for the fact that I checked before hand and I was doubly covered with insurance through my credit card company and through State Farm but felt very pressured at the desk to almost double the price of the car by getting additional insurance. I could've held my ground but my husband finally wanted to be done with the unpleasant conversation and we purchased an unwanted unneeded insurance .
